Chapter 2832: Chapter 1507: All The Philosophers Teach Me, The Spiritual Sword Technique Descends From The Skies_3

Chapter 2832: Chapter 1507: All the Philosophers Teach Me, the Spiritual Sword Technique Descends from the Skies_3

Feng Zhongzui’s eyes nearly popped out on the spot, entranced by the barrier constructed of spider legs.

It wasn’t just him, Mei Siren, Feng Tingchen, and others also had expressions of shock, taking steps to move forward and investigate.

What is that?

What on earth is that?

Spirit, Sword, Nian… and wait, traces of the Way of the Heavens’ energy movement?

Such a hodgepodge, can it really constitute a so-called “Spiritual Sword Version of Mountains and Seas Converge”?

The worldview of ancient swordsmen was, at this moment, shattered into pieces by Xu Xiaoshou’s playfully executed “sword technique,” no longer maintaining its complete form.

Laymen watch the excitement, while experts watch the…

Experts, at this moment, let alone the method, can’t even make out the threshold!

…

In the Southern Region, Dao Qiongcang abruptly handed over the battle scene in his hands to Bazhun’an.

In truth, there was no need for him to pass it on; Elder Wuyue and Bazhun’an had already sensitively turned their gazes upon hearing about this so-called “spiritual sword technique.”

But when countless spider legs split from Xu Xiaoshou’s body, turning him into a creature neither human nor ghost, Elder Wuyue was dumbfounded.

“This…”

He dared to admit frankly that he was ignorant.

However, when he saw Bazhun’an’s shocked yet joyous, even eager expression, Elder Wuyue couldn’t help but question internally, ultimately unable to voice it out loud.

“You don’t understand,” said Hallmaster Dao, glancing over and seeing Old Gou’s baffled eyes, immediately grasping the situation.

He looked back at Bazhun’an, surprise in his voice as he asked on his behalf, “But, do you understand?”

“No!”

It was rare to hear such a firm “no” from Bazhun’an. Dao Qiongcang paused, then asked further, “So what are you smiling about?”

A wrinkle formed in Bazhun’an’s eyes, as if he didn’t hear the sarcasm:

“I’m delighted that although his path is incomparable and his future uncertain, today, I finally see a semblance of it.”

…

At Feng Family City, on the First Viewing Platform.

Feng Xiaose, disguised as an ordinary spiritual swordsman, when he saw the image of “Spiritual Sword Technique·Mountain and Sea” presented in three dimensions by the Dao Imparting Mirror…

“Impossible!”

He could no longer restrain himself and cried out in shock, his eyes filled with bloodshot lines.

What he sought after…

What he had yearned for daily over dozens of years…

Even betraying the Feng family to join Xu Yue Grey Palace, just to get a bit closer to it…

Xu Xiaoshou got it with just a close and open of his eyes?

Impossible!

Absolutely impossible!

“The spiritual sword technique is mine!”

Feng Xiaose roared in his mind, his eyes nearly spitting fire.

At this moment, he wished he could rush to the Central Region and strike that youngster dead with the Wrath of the Great Crimson God.

How could he be worthy?

He has paid nothing!

Wasn’t it just him standing there, and she threw herself into his arms?

“I cannot accept this, I cannot…!”

Feng Xiaose was on the verge of breaking down.

And since when did the spiritual sword technique take such form?

It should be as lovely as something that belongs in the heavens, appearing in the Second World with the most magnificent posture.

Not some ugly mixture of bits and bobs, hastily assembled into a giant spider, and daring to call it “Spiritual Sword Technique·Mountain and Sea Converge” as though a “ghost thing”!

“Xu Xiaoshou, I’ll kill you, ahhh!”

“You can’t do this to me, wuuu…”

…

In the Eighth Palace, before the Dao Imparting Mirror.

Ye Xiaotian stared blankly at Xiao Qixiu beside him, who unexpectedly entered an Enlightenment State.

He didn’t understand.

He didn’t understand how, when he hadn’t been around, Xiao Qixiu couldn’t grasp the Way even when listening to the Saint’s teachings, as dumb as a pig!

And now that he was here, was Old Xiao also reaching that state?

Oh, so there had to be someone to play the foil?

When all four were in the Spirit Palace, Elder Sang sneaked out to make achievements, leaving three, and only when I grasp the Upanishad to become sanctified, leaving Old Qiao and Old Xiao, then Old Qiao first, and just Old Xiao left…

I really shouldn’t have come!

He’s having his breakthrough too? He’s not about to become a saint all of a sudden, is he?

I’m a demi-saint of space, and I haven’t even had my moment of glory yet. Could you all not chase so eagerly?

This Xu Xiaoshou, this giant spider, what’s there to enlighten about, isn’t it just that?

But still…

Xiao Qixiu’s eyes burned with passion, almost as if they’d be drawn into the Dao Imparting Mirror, yet he restrained himself remarkably.

After waiting for a long while, Ye Xiaotian could only hear a surprised murmur:

“So it turns out, it can be done this way?”
